title: shadowsocks使用手册
content:
### shadowsocks使用手册

> 原理：vultr + shadowsocks + xshell + $ + 客户端（如shadowrocket）

#### 服务端
```
//通过xshell连接vultr的服务器
IP Address: 107.191.43.121
protocol: ssh
port: 22
Username: root
Password: _Qb4v?u2_.{9q8*%

```

###### 服务端常用命令
```
//使用 vi 指令创建配置文件
vi /etc/shadowsocks.json
//后台运行服务
ssserver -c /etc/shadowsocks.json -d start
//停止服务
ssserver -c /etc/shadowsocks.json -d stop
//重启服务
/etc/init.d/shadowsocks restart
//查看运行日志
tail -f -n 100 /var/log/shadowsocks.log


```

#### 客户端
```
//通过ios的shadowrocket连接vultr的服务器
graph LR
添加节点-->全局路由:代理

{
    port: 8989,
    password: "qweasd107"
}
```


>[vultr + 锐速 + ssr](http://www.aloneray.com/54.html)
[锐速破解版](https://www.qcgzxw.cn/1640.html)
[vultr个人中心](https://my.vultr.com/) [VPS搭建SS服务-github](https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks/issues/1183)   [shadowsocks](https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks/blob/master/README.md)
[shadowsocks-manager](https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-manager)

[无锐速-10分钟搭建梯子](https://medium.com/@velacielad/%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8-vultr-shadowsocks-%E6%90%AD%E6%A2%AF%E5%AD%90%E7%9A%84%E7%AC%94%E8%AE%B0-2c695a6c5819)

title: Hello World
content: Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).
